title: Web Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Instructional Design for Strengthening Teaching Presence in Online BBA Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level comprehension of core business concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify instructor’s direct teaching methods (instructions, feedback, explanations) in online lecture materials with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze 3+ types of teaching presence in online elements beyond discussion boards (assignments, multimedia content).
Learners create self-assessment rubrics for 3 teaching presence categories (course design, direct instruction, facilitation) and evaluate applicability.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
